comment: In a normal modal logic, the modal axiom GL implies the modal axiom (4). Note that the antecedent of ~ bj-gl4 is an instance of the axiom GL, with ` ph ` replaced by ` ( A. x ph /\ ph ) ` , sometimes called the "strong necessity" of ` ph ` . (Contributed by BJ, 12-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
